episodes.title: Why Leaving Religion Is Like Escaping a Cult
episodes.description:
Leaving religion can feel less like a gentle shift and more like breaking out of a high-control system. 

In this video, The Unseen Question explores the striking parallels between leaving religion and escaping a cult — from psychological conditioning to fear-based control. 

With real-world examples, sociological insight, and a clear-eyed look at the recovery process, this is an honest, thought-provoking examination of what it means to reclaim your mind, your values, and your life...
